Script.comments: Scripts for calculating table column widths

For.D: [ skline(0, 32, 0, 0), sklineTo($box.w, 0), sklineTo($box.w, $box.h), sklineTo(0, $box.h), sklineTo(0, 32), sklineTo($box.w, 32) ]
[ skline(0, 0, $box.w, 0), sklineTo($box.w, $box.h), sklineTo(0, $box.h), z ]

For.TextContent: $textContent

For.D: [ skline(0, 0, $box.w, 0), sklineTo($box.w, $box.h), sklineTo(0, $box.h), sklineTo(0, 0), z ]

For.TextContent: $textContent

For.D: [ skline(0, 0, $box.w, 0), sklineTo($box.w, $box.h), sklineTo(0, $box.h), sklineTo(0, 0), z ]

Property.name: headerContent
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'headerText', bound: new Bound(10, 0, $box.w -10, 32), font: $textFont, align: $textAlign, multi: false})

PropertyGroup.name: Message Texts

Property.name: messageContent
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'messageClipPathRect', bound: new Bound(100, 60, $box.w - 133, ($box.h / 2) - 30), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(0, 0), multi: true})

PropertyGroup.Property:
Secrevit fontes liquidum locoque pronaque?

Illas semine campoque declivia oppida corpora nam inter fuit discordia tellus solidumque iunctarum erat: quae terrenae ubi rerum recessit iudicis aestu fixo

For.D: [ skline(0, 32, 0, 0), sklineTo($box.w, 0), sklineTo($box.w, $box.h), sklineTo(0, $box.h), sklineTo(0, 32), sklineTo($box.w, 32) ]

For.TextContent: $btn1Text

For.D: [ skline($box.w - 150, $box.h - 65, $box.w - 33, $box.h - 65), sklineTo($box.w - 33, $box.h - 25), sklineTo($box.w - 150, $box.h - 25), z ]
[ skline($box.w - 300, $box.h - 65, $box.w -183, $box.h - 65), sklineTo($box.w - 183, $box.h - 25), sklineTo($box.w - 300, $box.h - 25), z ]

For.TextContent: $btn2Text
$textContent

BoxFit.Arg: var targetBox = F.getObjectBoundingBox('text'); new Bound(20, 0, targetBox.w, 16)

For.TextContent: $textContent

BoxFit.Arg: var targetBox = F.getObjectBoundingBox('text'); new Bound(20, 0, targetBox.w, 16)

For.D: [ skline(0, 0, $box.w, 0), sklineTo($box.w, $box.h), sklineTo(0, $box.h), z ]

For.TextContent: $textContent

For.D: [ skline(0, 0, $box.w, 0), sklineTo($box.w, $box.h), sklineTo(0, $box.h), z ]
[ skline($box.w - 26, ($box.h / 2) - 4, $box.w - 10, ($box.h / 2) - 4), sklineTo($box.w - 18, ($box.h / 2) + 4), z ]

For.TextContent: $textContent

PropertyGroup.name: Text

Property.name: textContent
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'textClipPathRect', bound: new Bound(10, 10, $box.w - 20, $box.h - 20), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(0, 0), multi: false})

PropertyGroup.Property:
Secrevit fontes liquidum locoque pronaque?

Illas semine campoque declivia oppida corpora nam inter fuit discordia tellus solidumque iunctarum erat: quae terrenae ubi rerum recessit iudicis aestu fixo

For.D: [ skline(0, 0, $box.w, 0), sklineTo($box.w, $box.h), sklineTo(0, $box.h), z ]
[ skline($box.w - 5, $box.h - 15, $box.w - 5, $box.h - 5), sklineTo($box.w - 15, $box.h - 5), z ]
[ skline(0, 0, $box.w, 0), sklineTo($box.w, $box.h), sklineTo(0, $box.h), z ]
[ skline($box.w / 2, 5, $box.w - 5,10), sklineTo(5, 10), z ]
[ skline($box.w / 2, $box.h - 5, $box.w - 5, $box.h - 10), sklineTo(5, $box.h - 10), z ]
[ skline(0, 0, $box.w, 0), sklineTo($box.w, $box.h), sklineTo(0, $box.h), z ]
[ skline(5, $box.h / 2, 10, 5), sklineTo(10, $box.h - 5), z ]
[ skline($box.w - 5, $box.h / 2, $box.w - 10, 5), sklineTo($box.w - 10, $box.h - 5), z ]

Property.name: monthContent
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'month', bound: new Bound(30, 0, $box.w - 60, (($box.h - 6) / 7)), font: $textFont, align: $textAlign, multi: false})

For.D: [ skline(0, 0, $box.w, 0), sklineTo($box.w, $box.h), sklineTo(0, $box.h), z ]

For.TextContent: $monthContent
var date = getCalendarDate($monthContent.toString(), 1, $start.value == "sunday" ? true : false) PlainText.fromString(date["value"]);
var date = getCalendarDate($monthContent.toString(), 2, $start.value == "sunday" ? true : false) PlainText.fromString(date["value"]);
